author: Teresa Strasser
title: 3 Facts About the Documentary ‘Malala'
text:
Previous Next 
Three years back, 15 year old Malala Yousafzai was shot for speaking out about how girls in her native Pakistan should be allowed to go to school. Did that stop her? No way! Yousafzai has since won the Nobel Peace Prize and now there's a documentary about her. We spoke with the director of "He Named Me Malala", Davis Guggenheim, and got a list of reasons “He Named Me Malala” is worth your time – The List ’s Teresa Strasser has them on the Lowdown . Reasons You Should Watch “He Named Me Malala” This isn’t your typical documentary You’ll see Malala as both a hero and an ordinary teenager The movie is the perfect extra dose of inspiration Copyright 2015 Scripps Media, Inc.
